jobDescription: Data Modeler  Ref No.: 18-26442  Location: Monterey Park, California  Title:- Data Modeler  Location:- Monterey Park, CA  Contract C2C  Data Models, Model Repository, Data Lineage  "Responsible for creating and maintaining product data models, providing expertise and leadership with respect to requirements, gathering, analyzing, executing and providing best practice recommendations throughout various project lifecycles. Translates business requirements into conceptual, logical, and physical data models.Facilitates JAD sessions to determine data rules, and holds data model Reviews with Data SMEs, Development teams, and architecture teams.Applies client naming standards, and metadata standards, checks models in and out of Model Repository, and documents data model translation decisions.Maps data lineage across implementations. This also includes use of data modeling and data profiling tools and techniques, and development of review and QA data requirements.Delivers product releases on-time and with quality. "
